item.description:
The graduates of Boston University's Creative Poetry MFA will be reading new work to celebrate the end of the academic year. Readers include our own Zachary Bos, alongside Adam Eaglin, Renee Emerson, Heather Green, Cassie Schmitz, Caroline Sterne, Vanesha Pravin, Maia Rauschenberg, and Hank Backer.

After the reading, we plan on heading over to the nearby AGNI Magazine offices to celebrate the release of their latest issue and indulge in tapas and hob-nobbery.
item.name: Boston University MFA Graduate Reading
